trans-unit.source: Represents an object that specifies the layout of a row of data.
trans-unit.target: Representa um objeto que especifica o layout de uma linha de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classes support the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classes oferecem suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> modo de exibição para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to style rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> às linhas de estilo em uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: The area to use to display the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: A área a ser usada para exibir o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.

trans-unit.source: Positions the content of a row according to the size of the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Posiciona o conteúdo de uma linha de acordo com o tamanho dos objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> correspondentes.

trans-unit.source: The actual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that is used to display the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> real que é usado para exibir o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data content to display in a row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conteúdo de dados a ser exibido em uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the content of a row.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que representa o conteúdo de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The typical usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to place it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control.
trans-unit.target: O uso típico do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> na [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] é colocá-lo em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de um controle.

trans-unit.source: The template binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> property to a property of the control by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Associa o modelo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> propriedade a uma propriedade do controle usando [extensão de marcação TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como associar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> controle.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A>.

trans-unit.source: [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)
trans-unit.target: [Visão geral das propriedades da dependência](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)

trans-unit.source: The maximum area to use to display the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: A área máxima a ser usada para exibir o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines the area that is required to display the row.
trans-unit.target: Determina a área necessária para exibir a linha.

trans-unit.source: The actual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> of the area that displays the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> real da área que exibe o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma representação de cadeia de caracteres da <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that shows the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que mostra o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
